title: The Little Red Caboose
description:
All aboard for the timeless classic about the littler red caboose with the big ambition!This classic Little Golden Book, originally published in 1953, tells the tale of a charming red caboose who wants nothing more than to be as popular as the big steam engine at the front of the train. Boys and girls will love the inspiring tale by 
Marian Potter
 and the colorful illustrations by Tibor Gergely.
author: Marian Potter
